summary: Noncitizens have a long history of serving in the U.S. military. Over 100,000 noncitizens joined from FYs 2010-2021. U.S. law authorizes the expedited naturalization of current and former servicemembers. Servicemember naturalization applications fell 78% from 2017 to 2018—from about 11,000 to 2,500. title: Military Naturalizations: Federal Agencies Assist with Naturalizations, but Additional Monitoring and Assessment Are Needed
